name: Christmas in Space
description:
Between the vast space and the blue glowing earth floats the International Space Station, the ISS. Get to know our colorful cast of astronauts on the ISS and enjoy our cozy game about pet ducks, food debates and celebrating Christmas in Space!

(PS: We recommend you get some hot chocolat and get under a warm blanket while playing for an extra comfy time) 

Features:

  • Fully voiced
  • Kinetic novel 
  • Diverse cast (Cuban, Russian, Japanese, American, Italian and British)
  • Over 3k words
  • Fully free!

Characters:

Silvia Fuentes, voiced by Kelsey Jaffer 

Jacqueline Becket  - voiced by Nhea Durousseau

Filippo Ferro - voiced by Peter Hotvedt

Radimir Medvedev - voiced by Norman Bradley 

Hotaru Fujimoto - voiced by Angel Haven Ray

"Doctor" - voiced by Mike Young
